headline: FCC Approves Rules to Expand 900 MHz Band to 10 MHz
summary: Transition to 10 MHz Broadband in 900 MHz Band Builds on Proven Success of Anterix-Enabled Private Wireless Broadband DeploymentsWOODLAND PARK, N.J., Feb. 18, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Anterix (NASDAQ: ATEX), the market leader in mission-critical private wireless broadband spectrum, is pleased to report that the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) has unanimously adopted a groundbreaking Report and Order (R&O), “Maximizing the Potential of the 900 MHz Band,” enabling broadband deployment acro
